Title: Requires the department of health to establish criteria for risk factors of drowning by children in various age groups
Summary: Requires the department of health to establish criteria for risk factors of drowning by children in various age groups; requires the department to conduct an ongoing public awareness and education program on drowning risks, precautions and life-saving procedures.
LawCode: Add ยง2500-i-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a child drowning prevention public awareness and education program
